statements: SELECT * FROM CampaignAnalysis WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, impact_on_sales FROM CampaignAnalysis;
SELECT * FROM CampaignAnalysis WHERE awareness_raised = TRUE;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM CampaignAnalysis WHERE impact_on_sales > 5000;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, campaign_end_date FROM CampaignAnalysis ORDER BY campaign_end_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, impact_on_sales FROM CampaignAnalysis WHERE awareness_raised = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM CampaignAnalysis WHERE campaign_id > 100 ORDER BY campaign_start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, impact_on_sales, awareness_raised FROM CampaignAnalysis WHERE impact_on_sales > 5000 AND campaign_name LIKE '%Summer%';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, awareness_raised FROM CampaignAnalysis WHERE campaign_start_date BETWEEN '2021-06-01' AND '2021-08-31';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date, impact_on_sales FROM CampaignAnalysis WHERE awareness_raised = FALSE AND impact_on_sales < 5000;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns
SELECT campaign_name, marketing_channel FROM marketing_campaigns
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_start_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_name DESC
SELECT DISTINCT marketing_channel FROM marketing_campaigns
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, campaign_start_date FROM marketing_campaigns;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_start_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY campaign_end_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, marketing_channel FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE marketing_channel IN ('Email', 'Social Media') ORDER BY campaign_start_date ASC, campaign_end_date DESC;

SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_end_date >= '2022-06-01' AND marketing_channel = 'Online Ads' ORDER BY campaign_start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-08-31' AND campaign_name LIKE 'Spring%' ORDER BY campaign_start_date ASC, campaign_end_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM impact_analysis ORDER BY campaign_name;
SELECT campaign_name, impact_type FROM impact_analysis WHERE impact_level > 3;
SELECT AVG(impact_level) AS avg_impact_level FROM impact_analysis;
SELECT * FROM user_feedback WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM sustainability_metrics WHERE metric_value > 20;
SELECT * FROM impact_analysis WHERE impact_level > 5;
SELECT campaign_name, impact_type FROM impact_analysis WHERE promotion_channel = 'Social Media';
SELECT * FROM user_feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM sustainability_metrics ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, impact_level FROM impact_analysis WHERE impact_type = 'Environmental' ORDER BY impact_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, budget FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT channel_name, audience_size FROM MarketingChannels WHERE audience_size > 10000 ORDER BY audience_size DESC;
SELECT metric_name, category, value FROM SustainabilityMetrics WHERE category = 'Energy Efficiency';
SELECT campaign_id, date, clicks, impressions FROM CampaignMetrics WHERE impressions >= 1000 AND clicks >= 500 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM Campaigns;
SELECT * FROM MarketingChannels WHERE audience_size > 10000;
SELECT cm.campaign_id, cm.date, cm.clicks, cm.impressions, sm.metric_name, sm.value FROM CampaignMetrics cm JOIN SustainabilityMetrics sm ON cm.campaign_id = sm.metric_id;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM Campaigns WHERE budget > 50000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;

SELECT cm.date, cm.clicks, cm.impressions, cm.sales, cm.conversions, sm.metric_name, sm.category, sm.value FROM CampaignMetrics cm JOIN SustainabilityMetrics sm ON cm.date = sm.value WHERE cm.sales > 1000;
SELECT * FROM campaign_data LIMIT 5;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM campaign_data WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM product_data ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM customer_data WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM campaign_data ORDER BY campaign_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM campaign_data WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date, end_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM product_data ORDER BY category ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, age, gender, location FROM customer_data WHERE age >= 30 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT product_name, price, material FROM product_data WHERE material LIKE '%wood%' AND price < 100;
